channel.title: Shop Assistant
channel.description: Can someone help me out with a shopassistant.java without player shop coding in it, or help me remove player shop from server.

item.title: Shop Assistant
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Do this in reverse order: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/334081-pi-any-player-owned-shop-official-release.html

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Assistant
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:5, topic:520244”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=638743.msg4305710#msg4305710 date=1369766631]

So u just dont want anyshops at all? Then just remove the shop npcs

I didn’t say I didn’t want any shops, I said “I DIDN’T WANT ANY PLAYER OWNED SHOPS”.

Post your shopassistant.java and maybe we can help you. What do you not want player owned shops?

Code is too long to post, but Yes. I dont want any player owned shops. An error, I’m having is when you walk out of the wildy it says “Attack” still on the other person, but as the 8second PK timer goes away, it says “Loading…” How can I remove that ? Its in the right click options when you right click on someone.
[/quote]Post shopassistant in pastebin then post it here.[/quote]

Here you go: http://pastebin.com/5TWCCWSm

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Assistant
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:

So u just dont want anyshops at all? Then just remove the shop npcs
[/quote]

I didn’t say I didn’t want any shops, I said “I DIDN’T WANT ANY PLAYER OWNED SHOPS”.

Post your shopassistant.java and maybe we can help you. What do you not want player owned shops?

Code is too long to post, but Yes. I dont want any player owned shops. An error, I’m having is when you walk out of the wildy it says “Attack” still on the other person, but as the 8second PK timer goes away, it says “Loading…” How can I remove that ? Its in the right click options when you right click on someone.[/quote]Post shopassistant in pastebin then post it here.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Assistant
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

khayam:

So u just dont want anyshops at all? Then just remove the shop npcs

I didn’t say I didn’t want any shops, I said “I DIDN’T WANT ANY PLAYER OWNED SHOPS”.

mr extremez:

Post your shopassistant.java and maybe we can help you. What do you not want player owned shops?

Code is too long to post, but Yes. I dont want any player owned shops. An error, I’m having is when you walk out of the wildy it says “Attack” still on the other person, but as the 8second PK timer goes away, it says “Loading…” How can I remove that ? Its in the right click options when you right click on someone.
